document_data.name: Sacrast Handragon
document_data.mainbody: '''Sacrast Handragon''' was a [[Cormyrean]] noble in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had a face that betrayed nothing. His voice was soft, close to being lazy.
document_data.Personality: When it suited him he could be ruthless and swift. He had very strong self-control.
document_data.Relationships:
Marlin Stormserpent believed he merited watching, not full trust.

[[Arclath Delcastle]] knew him to be associated with Marlin Stormserpent, [[Mellast Ormblade]], and [[Irlin Stonestable]], as well as three lords around Arclath's own age, [[Broryn Windstag]], [[Kathkote Dawntard]], and [[Delasko Sornstern]].{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|364|34}}
